Plot: From a young scholar to one of history's most powerful warriors, this novel tells the story of Kublai Khan - an extraordinary man who should be remembered alongside Julius Caesar, Alexander the Great and Napoleon Bonaparte as one of the greatest conquerors the world has ever known.
Characters: Kublai Khan, Hulagu Khan, Subutai, Chagatai Khan, Batu Khan, Baidar, Güyük Khan, Möngke Khan, Töregene Khatun, Oghul Qaimish, Ariq Böke
